GK16mamkpb_u:2406: śaurirbhujairiva caturbhiradaḥ sadā yo lakṣmīvilāsabhavanairbhuvanaṃ babhāra // 394 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2408: suratarusadṛśaḥ sa bhavānabhilaṣaṇīyaḥ kṣitīśvara na kasya // 395 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2412: tathā jayaśrīstvadāsevanenetyādinā pratīyamānena vinā yadyapi noktervaicitryam,
GK16mamkpb_u:2417: rasādistu vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'laṃkārāntaraṃ ca sarvatrāvyabhicārītyagaṇayitvaiva tadalaṃkārā udāhṛtāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2421: tadvat dharmasya lope syāt na śrautī taddhite punaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2425: udāharaṇam-- dhanyasyānanyasāmānyasaujanyotkarṣaśālinaḥ karaṇīyaṃ vacaśvetaḥ satyaṃ tasyāmṛtaṃ yathā // 397 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2429: viṣakalpaṃ mano vetsi yadi jīvasi tatsakhe // 399 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2433: dīsai aha va ṇisammai sarisaṃ aṃsaṃsametteṇa // 400 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2434: kavvassetyatra kavvasamamiti sarisamityatra ca ṇūṇamiti pāṭhe,
GK16mamkpb_u:2439: vāśabdaḥ, upamādyotaka iti vāderupamāpratipādakasya lope ṣaṭ samāsena sarmaṇo 'dhikaraṇāccotpannena kyacā kartuḥ kyaṅā karmakartrorupapadayorṇamulā ca bhavet //
GK16mamkpb_u:2444: pairaṃ sutīyati janaṃ samarāntare 'sāvantaḥ purīyati vicitracaritracuñcuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2445: nārīyate samārasīmni kṛpāṇapāṇerālokya tasya caritāni sapatnasenā // 403 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2451: udāharaṇam-- savitā vidhavati vidhurapi savitarati tathā dinanti yāminyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2481: iti bhenne ca tasmin ekasyaiva bahūpamānopādāne mālopamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2486: tasya sabheva jayaśrīḥ śakyā jetuṃ nṛpasya na pareṣām // 413 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2494: udāharaṇam-- na kevalaṃ bhāti nitāntakāntirniṃtambinī saiva nitambinīva /
GK16mamkpb_u:2504: udāharaṇam-- kamaleva matirmatiriva kamalā tanuriva vibhā vibheva tanuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2505: dharaṇīva dhṛcirdhṛtiriva dharaṇī satataṃ vibhāti bata yasya // 415 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2509: udārahaṇam-- unmeṣaṃ yo mama na sahate jātivairī niśāyām intorintīvaradaladṛśā tasya saundaryadarpaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2510: nītaḥ śāntiṃ prasabhamanayā vaktrakāntyeti harṣā- llagrā manye lalitatanu te pādayoḥ pajhalakṣmīḥ // 416 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2516: bhedīktau yathā ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2517: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti ciraṃ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ // 418 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2518: bhedhoktāvityanena na kevalamayaṃ niśvayagarbho yāvannisvayānto 'pi saṃdehaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2519: yathā induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametat kimambu kutra gatam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2521: kiṃ tu niśvayagarbha iva nātra niśvayaḥ pratīyamāna iti,
GK16mamkpb_u:2523: tadanuktau yathā asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2524: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ // 420 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2534: yathā jyotsnābhasmacchuraṇadavalā bibhratī tārakāsthī- nyantardhānavyasanarasikā rātrikāpālikīyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2535: dvīpāddvīpaṃ bhramati dadhatī candarmudrākapāle nyastaṃ siddhāñjanaparimalaṃ lāñchanasya cchalena // 421 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2537: antardhānavyasanarasikatvamāropitadharma eveti rūpakaparigrahe sādhakamastīti tatsaṃkarāśaṅkā na kāryā //
GK16mamkpb_u:2542: yathā jassa raṇanteurae kare kuṇantassa maṇḍalaggalaam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2543: rasasaṃmuhī vi sahasā paraṃmuhī hoi riuseṇā // 422 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2544: atra raṇasyāntaḥpuratvamāropyamāṇaṃ śabdopātm maṇḍalāgralatāyāḥ nāyikātvam ripusenāyāśva pratināyikātvam arthasāmarthyādavasīyate, iti,
GK16mamkpb_u:2551: yathā kuraṅgīvāṅgāni stimitayati gītadhvaniṣu yat sakhīṃ kāntodantaṃ śrutamapi punaḥ praśrayati yat /
GK16mamkpb_u:2552: anidraṃ yaccāntaḥ svapiti tadaho vedmyabhinavāṃ pravṛtto 'syāḥ sektuṃ hṛdi manasijaḥ premalatikāma // 423 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2556: yathā saundaryasya taraṅgiṇī taruṇimotkarṣasya harṣodgamaḥ kānteḥ kārmaṇakarma narmarahasāmullāsanāvāsabhūḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2557: vidyā vakragirāṃ vidheranavadhiprāvīṇyasākṣātkriyā bāṇāḥ pañcaśilīmukhasya lalanācūḍāmaṇiḥ sā priyā // 424 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2560: tat paraṃparitaṃ śliṣṭe vācake bhedabhāji vā //95//
GK16mamkpb_u:2562: satyaprītividhānadakṣa vijayaprāgbhāvabhīma prabho sāmrājyaṃ varavīra vatsaraśataṃ vairiñcamuccaiḥ kriyāḥ // 425 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2563: atra mānasameva mānasam kamalāyāḥ saṃkoca eva kamalānāmasaṃkocaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2564: durgāṇāmamārgaṇameva durgāyāḥ mārgaṇam samitāṃ svīkāra eva samidhāṃ svīkāraḥ satye prītireva satyāmaprītiḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2567: yadyapi śabdārthālaṃkāro 'yamityuktam vakṣyate ca tathāpi prasiddhyanurodhādatroktaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2569: bhedabhāji yathā ālānaṃ jayakuñjarasya dṛṣadāṃ seturvipadvāridheḥ pūrvādriḥ karavālacaṇḍhamahaso līlopadhānaṃ śriyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2570: saṃgrāmāmṛtasāgarapramathanakrīḍāvidau mandaro rājan rājati vīravairivanitāvaidhavyadasate bhujaḥ // 426 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2575: niravadhi ca nirāśrayaṃ ca yasya sthitamanivartitakautukaprapañcam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2576: prathama iha bhavān sa kūrmamūrtirjayati caturdaśalokavallikandaḥ // 428 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2580: ityādi raśanārūpakaṃ na vaicitryavaditi na lakṣitam //
GK16mamkpb_u:2583: upameyam asatyaṃ kṛtvopamānaṃ satyatayā yat sthāpyate sā tu, apahnutiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2584: udāharaṇam-- avāptaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ pariṇatarucaḥ śailatanaye kalaṅko naivāyaṃ vilasati śaśāhkasya vapuṣi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2585: amuṣyeyaṃ manye vigaladamṛtasyantaśiśire ratiśrāntā śete rajaniramaṇī gāḍhamurasi // 430 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2586: itthaṃ vā bata sakhi kiyadetat paśya vairaṃ smarasya priyavirahakṛśe 'smin rāgiloke tathā hi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2589: api tu sakālakūṭāḥ śarā iti pratītiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2590: evaṃ vā amuṣmiṃllāvaṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛṣujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2591: yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ pratamapiśunā nābhikuhare śikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati romāvalivapuḥ // 432 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2599: udāharaṇam-- udayamayate diṅbhālinyaṃ nirākurutetarām nayati nidhanaṃ nidrāmudrāṃ pravartayati kriyāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2600: racayatitarāṃ svairācārapravartanakartanam vata bata lasattejaḥpuñjo vibhāti vibhākaraḥ // 433 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2604: prakṛtārthapratipādakavākyena śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇamāhātmayāt na tu viśeṣyasya sāmarthyādapi yat aprakṛtasyārthasyābhidhānam sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇārthadvayakathanāt samāsoktiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2605: udāharaṇam--lahiūṇa tujjha bāhuphphaṃsaṃ jīe sa ko vi ullāso /
GK16mamkpb_u:2606: jaalacchī tuha virahe ṇa hūjjalā dubbalā ṇaṃ sā // 434 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2612: udāharaṇam-- kvasūryaprabhavo vaṃśaḥ kva cālpaviṣayā matiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2614: atra, uḍupena sāgarataraṇamiva manmatyā sūryavaṃśavarṇanamityupamāyāṃ paryavasyati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2615: yathā vā udayati vitatordhvaraśmirajjāvahimarucau himadhāmni yāti cāstam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2617: atra kathamanyasya līlāmanyo vahatīti tatsadṛśīmityupamāyāṃ paryavasānam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2619: meruṃ lilaṅghayiṣati dhruvameṣa deva yaste guṇān gaditumudyamamādadhāti // 437 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2625: yathā unnataṃ padamavāpya yo laghurhelayaiva sa patediti bruvan /
GK16mamkpb_u:2633: kārye nimitte sāmānye viśeṣe prastute sati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2636: krameṇodāharaṇam-- yātā kiṃ na milanti sundari punaśvintā tvayā matkṛte no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāsi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2637: lajjāmantharatārakeṇa nipatatpītāśruṇā cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā māṃ hasitena bhāvimaraṇotsāhastayā sūcitaḥ // 439 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2638: atra prasthānātkimiti nivṛtto 'sīti kārye pṛṣṭe kāraṇamabhihitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2639: rājantarājasutā na pāṭhayati māṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kubje bhojaya māṃ kumārasacivairnādyāpi kiṃ bhujyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2640: ityaṃ nātha śukastāvāribhavane mukto 'dhvagaiḥ pañjarāt citrasthānavalokya śūnyavalabhāvekaikamābāṣate // 440 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2641: atra prasthānodyataṃ bhavantaṃ jñātvā sahasaiva tvadarayaḥ palāyya gatāḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2643: etattasya mukhātkiyat kamalinīpatre kaṇaṃ vāriṇo yanmuktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvanyadasmādapi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2644: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanaiḥ kutroḍḍīya gato mametyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥśucā // 441 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2645: atrāsthāne jaḍānāṃ mamatvasaṃbhāvanā bhavatīti sāmānye prastute viśeṣaḥ kathitaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2647: sa eva pūjyaḥ sa pumānsa nītimānsujīvitaṃ tasya sa bhājanaṃ śriyaḥ // 442 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2648: atra “kṛṣṇaṃ nihatya narakāsuravadhūnāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ praśamayasi tat tvameva ślāghyaḥ';
GK16mamkpb_u:2651: śleṣaḥ samāsoktiḥ sādṛśyamātraṃ vā tulyāt tulyasya hyākṣepe hetuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2652: krameṇodāharaṇam-- puṃstvādapi pravicalet yadi yadyadho 'pi yāyāt yadi praṇayane namahānapi syāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:2653: abhyuddharettadapi viśvamitīdṛśīyaṃ kenāpi dik prakaṭitā puruṣottamena // 443 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2654: yenāsyabhyuditena candra gamitaḥ klāntiṃ ravau tatra te yujyeta pratikartumeva na punastasyaiva pādagrahaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2655: kṣīṇenaitadanuṣṭhitaṃ yadi tataḥ kiṃ lajjase no manāg astvenaṃ jaḍadhāmatā tu bhavato yad vyāmni visphūrjase // 444 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2656: ādāya vāri paritaḥ saritāṃ mukhebhyaḥ kiṃ tāvadarjitamanena durarṇavena /
GK16mamkpb_u:2657: kṣārīkṛtaṃ ca vaḍavādahane hutaṃ ca pātālakukṣikuhare viniveśitaṃ ca // 445 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2658: iyaṃ ca kācit vācye pratīyamānārthānadhyāropeṇaiva bhavati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2659: yathā abdherambhaḥ sthagitabhuvanābogapātālakukṣeḥ potopāyā iha hi bahavo laṅghane 'pi kṣamante /
GK16mamkpb_u:2660: āho riktaḥ kathamapi bhavedeṣa daivāt tadānīṃ ko nāma syādavaṭakuharālokane 'pyasya kalpaḥ // 446 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2662: yathā kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi sādhu viditaṃ kasmādidaṃ kathyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2663: vāmenātra vaṭastamadhvagajanaḥ sarvātmanā sevate na cchāyāpi paropakārakaraṇe mārgasthitasyāpi me // 447 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2665: yathā so 'pūrvo rasanāviparyayavidhiḥ tat karṇayośvāpalaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sā madavismṛtasvaparadik kiṃ bhūyakoktena vā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2666: sarvaṃ vismṛtavānasi bhramara he yadvāraṇo 'dyāpyasau antaḥśūnyakaro niṣevyata iti bhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ // 448 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2667: atra rasanāviparyāsaḥ śūnyakaratvaṃ ca bhramarasyāsevane na hetuḥ karṇacāpalaṃ tu hetuḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2675: yathā kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām /
GK16mamkpb_u:2679: yathā aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ aṇṇā via kā vi vattaṇacchāā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2680: sāmā sāmaṇṇapaāvaiṇo reha ccia ṇa hoī // 450 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2683: uktau yat kalpanam (arthāt asaṃbhavino 'rthasya) sā tṛtīyā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2686: kāraṇasya śīghrakāritāṃ vaktuṃ kāryasya pūrvamuktau caturthī /
GK16mamkpb_u:2694: upamānavākye ca kathitapadasya duṣṭatayābhihitatvāt śabdabhedena yat upādīyate sā vastuno vākyārthasyopamānatvāt prativastūpamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2695: yathā devībhāvaṃ gamitā parivārapadaṃ kathaṃ bhajatveṣā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2697: yadi dahatyanalo 'tra kimadbhutaṃ yadi ca gauravamadriṣu kiṃ tataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2703: eteṣāṃ sādhāraṇadharmādīnāma dṛṣṭo 'ntaḥ niśvayo yatra sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2704: tvayi dṛṣṭa eva tasyā nirvāti mano manobhavajvalitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2707: vaidharmyeṇa tu tavāhave sāhasakarmaśarmaṇaḥ karaṃ kṛpāṇāntikamāninīṣataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2714: ekavārameva yat upādīyate tat ekasthasyaiva samastavākyadīpanāt dīpakam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2715: yathā kivaṇāṇaṃ dhaṇaṃ ṇāāṇaṃ phaṇamaṇī keśarāiṃ sīhāṇaṃ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2718: yathā svidyati kūṇati vellati vicalati nimiṣati vilokayati tiryak /
GK16mamkpb_u:2724: yathā saṃgrāmāṅgaṇamāgatena bhavatā cāpe samāropite devākarṇaya yena yena sahasā yadyatsamāsāditam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2725: kodaṇḍena śarāḥ śarairariśirastenāpi bhūmaṇḍalaṃ tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca lokatraḍalaṃ tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca lokatrayam // 459 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2729: krameṇodāharaṇam-- pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2736: kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇo 'pi śaśī bhūyo bhūyo 'bhivardhate satyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2737: virama prasīda sundari yauvanamanivarti yātaṃ tu // 462 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2738: ityādānupamānasyopameyādādhikyamiti kenaciduktam tadayuktam atra yauvanagatāsthairyādhikyaṃ hi vivakṣitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2752: atraiva tuccheti mahādhṛterityanayoḥ paryāyeṇa yugapadvānupādāne 'nyat bhedatrayam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2774: atra tulyārthe vatiḥ viṣamādayaśva śabdāḥ śliṣṭāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2779: yūnāmatīva pibatāṃ rajanīṣu yatra tṛṣṇāṃ jahāra madhu nānanamaṅganānām // 470 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2780: atrevādīnāṃ tulyādīnāṃ ca padānāmabhāve 'pi śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇairākṣiptaivopamā pratīyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2781: evaṃjātīyakāḥ śliṣṭoktiyogyasya padasya pṛthagupādāne 'nye 'pi bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti /
GK16mamkpb_u:2787: aśakyavaktavyatvamatiprasiddhatvaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vaktuṃ niṣedho niṣedha iva yaḥ sa vakṣyamāṇaviṣaya uktaviṣayaśveti dvidhā, ākṣepaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2788: krameṇodāharaṇam-- e ehi kiṃpi kīevi kaeṇa ṇikviva bhaṇāmi alamaha vā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2790: jyotsnā mauktikadāma candanarasaḥ śītāṃśukāntadravaḥ karpūraṃ kadalī mṛṇālavalayānyambhojinīpallavāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2791: anyarmānasamāstvayā prabhavatā tasyāḥ sphuliṅgotkara- vyāpārāya bhavanti inta hanta kimanenoktena na brūmahe // 472 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2804: krameṇodārahaṇam-- nidrānivṛttāvudite dyuratne sakhījane dvārapadaṃ parāpte /
GK16mamkpb_u:2806: karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimān yo jane jane /
GK16mamkpb_u:2809: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śaṃbhunā na balaṃ hṛtam // 476 //

GK16mamkpb_u:3143: atra dṛktaralatādikamaṅgasya liṅgaṃ svābhāvikam sādhāraṇaṃ ca mahodayena tatrāpyetasya darśanāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3144: ye kandarāsu nivasanti sadā himādrestvatpātaśaṅkitadhiyo vivaśā dviṣaste /
GK16mamkpb_u:3145: apyaṅgamutpulakamudvahatāṃ sakampaṃ teṣāmaho bata bhiyāṃ na budho 'pyabhijñaḥ // 547 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3147: āgantukatvāttatprabhavayorapi kampapulakayostādrūpyaṃ samānatā ca bhayeṣvapi tayorupalakṣitatvāt //
GK16mamkpb_u:3151: pūrva pūrvaṃ prati yathottarasya vastuno vīpsayā viśeṣaṇabhāvena yat sthāpanaṃ niṣedho vā saṃbhavati sā dvidhā budhairekāvalī bhaṇyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:3152: krameṇodāharaṇam-- purāṇi yasyāṃ savarāṅganāni varāṅganā rūpapūraskṛtāṅgyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3154: na tajjalaṃ yanna sucārupaṅkajaṃ na paṅkajaṃ tat yadalīnaṣaṭpadam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3155: na ṣaṭmado 'sau kalaguñjito na yo na guñjitaṃ tanna jahāra yanmanaḥ // 549 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3156: pūrvatra purāṇāṃ varāṅganāḥ tāsāmaṅgaviśeṣaṇamukhena rūpam tasya vilāsāḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3163: yadā kadācit anubhūto 'bhūt sa kālāntare smṛtipratibodhādhāyini tatsamāne vastuni dṛṣṭe sati yat tathaiva smaryate tat bhavet smaraṇam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3164: udāharaṇam-- nimnanābhikuhareṣu yadambhaḥ plāvitaṃ caladṛśāṃ laharībhiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3172: tasya tathāvidhasya dṛṣṭau satyāṃ yat aprākaraṇikatayā saṃvedanam sa bhrāntimān /
GK16mamkpb_u:3173: na ceṣa rupakaṃ prathamātiśayoktirvā tatra vastuto bhramasyābhāvāt iha ca,
GK16mamkpb_u:3174: arthānugamanena saṃjñāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ tasya spaṣṭameva pratipannatvāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3175: udāharaṇam-- kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti karān leḍhi śaśina- starucchidraprotān bisamiti karī saṃkalayati /
GK16mamkpb_u:3176: ratānte talpasthān harati vanitāpyaṃśukamiti prabhāmattaśvandro jagadidamaho viplavayati // 552 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3180: asya dhuraṃ sutarāmupameyameva voḍhuṃ prauḍhamiti kaimarthyena yat upamānamākṣipyate yadapi tasyaivopamānatayā prasiddhasya,
GK16mamkpb_u:3182: krameṇodāharaṇam-- lāvaṇyaukasi sapratāpagarimaṇyagresare tyāgināṃ deva tvayyavanībharakṣamabhuje niṣpādite vedhasā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3183: induḥ kiṃ ghaṭitaḥ kimeṣa vihitaḥ pūṣā kimutpāditaṃ cintāratnamado mudhaiva kimamī sṛṣṭāḥ kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ // 553 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3184: e ehi dāva sundari kaṇṇaṃ dāūṇa suṇasū vaaṇijjaṃ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3185: tujjha muheṇa kisoari caṃdo ubhamijjai jaṇeṇa // 554 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3190: yathā garvamasaṃvāhyamimaṃ locanayugalena kiṃ vahasi mugdhe /
GK16mamkpb_u:3191: santīdṛśāni diśi diśi saraḥsu nanu nīlanalināni // 555 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3194: anubhūtapūrvi tasya tatkalpanāyāmapi bhavati pratīpamiti pratyetavyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3195: yathā ahameva guruḥ sudāruṇānāmiti hālāhala tāta mā sma dṛpyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3196: nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhūyo bhuvane 'smin vacanāni durjanānām // 556 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3201: atādṛśamapi tādṛśatayā vivakṣituṃ yat aprastutārthena saṃpṛktamaparityakranijaguṇameva tadekātmatayā nibadhyate tat samānaguṇanibandhanāt sāmānyam
GK16mamkpb_u:3207: yathā vā vetratvacā tulyarucāṃ vadhunāṃ karṇāgrato gaṇḍatalāgatāni /
GK16mamkpb_u:3209: atra nimittāntarajanitāpi nānātvapratītiḥ prathamapratipannamabhedaṃ na vyudasitumutsahate pratītatvāttasya pratīteśva bādāyogāt //
GK16mamkpb_u:3215: prasiddhādhāraparihāreṇa yat ādheyasya viśiṣṭā sthitirabhidhīyate sa prathamo viśeṣaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3217: ramayanti jaganti giraḥ kathamiha kavayo na te vandyāḥ // 559 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3218: ekamapi vastu yat ekenaiva svabhāvena yugapadanekatra vartate sa dvitīyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3219: udāharaṇam-- sā vasai tujjha hiae sā ccia acchīsu sā a vaaṇeśu /
GK16mamkpb_u:3224: vidhinā sasṛje navo manobhūrbhuvi satyaṃ savitā bṛhaspatiśva // 561 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3225: yathā vā gṛhiṇī sacivaḥ sakhī mithaḥ priyaśiṣyā lalite kalāvidhau /
GK16mamkpb_u:3226: karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā haratā tvāṃ bata kiṃ na me hṛnam // 562 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3227: sarvatra, evaṃvidhaviṣaye 'tiśayoktireva prāṇatvenāvatiṣṭhate tāṃ vinā prāyeṇālaṃkāratvāyogāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3233: vastu tadguṇatāmeti bhaṇyate sa tu tadguṇaḥ //137//
GK16mamkpb_u:3234: vastu tiraskatanijarūpaṃ kenāpi samīpagatena praguṇayā svaguṇasaṃpadoparaktaṃ tatpratibhāsamevayatsamāsādayati sa tadguṇaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3236: udāharaṇam-- viminnavarṇā garuḍāgrajena sūryasya rathyāḥ paritaḥ sphurantyā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3237: ratnaiḥ punaryatra rucā rucaṃ svāmāninyire vaṃśakarīranīlaiḥ // 563 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3238: atra ravituragāpekṣayā garuḍāgrajasya tadapekṣayā ca harinmaṇīnāṃ praguṇavarṇatā //
GK16mamkpb_u:3241: yadi tu tadīyaṃ varṇaṃ saṃbhantyāmapi yogyatāyām idaṃ nyūnaguṇaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt tadā bhavedatadguṇo nāma /
GK16mamkpb_u:3242: udāharaṇam-- dhavalosi jaha vi sundara taha vi tue majjha rañjiaṃ hiaaṃ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3243: rāabharapie vi hiae suhaa ṇihitto ṇa rattosi // 564 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3244: atrātiraktenāpi manasā saṃyukto na raktatāmupagata ityatadguṇaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3245: kiṃca taditi aprakṛtam asyeti ca prakṛtamatra nirdiśyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:3246: tena yat aprakṛtasya rūpaṃ prakṛtena kuto 'pi nimittāt nānuvidhīyate so 'tadguṇa ityapi pratipattavyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3247: yathā gāṅgamambu sidamambu yāmunaṃ kajjalābhamubhayatra majjataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3248: rājahaṃsa tava saiva śubhratā cīyate na ca na cāpacīyate // 565 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3251: tathaiva yadvidhīyeta sa vyāghāta iti smṛtaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3252: yenopāyena yat ekenopakalpitam tasyānyena jigīṣutayā tadupāyakameba yat anyathākaraṇam sa sādhitavastuvyāhatihetutvāt vyāghātaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3253: udāharaṇam-- dṛśā dagdhaṃ manasijaṃ jīvayanti dṛśaiva yāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3257: eteṣāṃ samanantaramevoktasvarūpāṇāṃ yathāsaṃbhavamanyonyanirapekṣatayā yat ekatra śabdabhāge eva,
GK16mamkpb_u:3270: so ṇatthi ettha gāme jo eaṃ mahamahantalāaṇṇaṃ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3273: saṃsargaśva tayorekatra vākye chandasi vā samavetatvāt //
GK16mamkpb_u:3277: anāsāditasvatantrabhāvāḥ parasparam anugrāhyānugrāhakatāṃ dadhati sa eṣāṃ saṃkīryamāṇasvarūpatvāt saṃkaraḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3278: udāharaṇam-- ātte sīmantaratne marakatini hṛte hematāṭaṅkapatre luptāyāṃ mekhalāyāṃ jhaṭiti maṇitulākoṭiyugme gṛhīte /
GK16mamkpb_u:3279: śoṇaṃ bimboṣṭhakāntyā tvadarimṛgadṛśāmitvarīṇāmaraṇye rājan guñjāphalānāṃ sraja iti śabarā naiva hāraṃ haranti // 570 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3280: atra tadguṇamapekṣya bhrāntimatā prādurbhūtam tadāśrayeṇa ca tadguṇaḥ sacetasāṃ prabhūtacamatkṛtinimittamityanayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3281: yathā vā jaṭābhābhirmābhiḥ karadhṛtakalaṅkākṣavalayo viyogivyāpatteriva kalitavairāgyaviśadaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3282: paripreṅkhattārāparikarakapālāṅkitatale śaśī bhasmāpāṇḍuḥ pitṛvana iva vyomni carati // 571 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3283: upamā rūpakam utprekṣā śleṣaśveti catvāro 'tra pūrvavat aṅgāṅgitayā pratīyante /
GK16mamkpb_u:3284: kalaṅka evākṣavalayamiti rūpakaparigrahe karadhṛtatvameva sādhakapramāṇatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:3285: asya hi rūpakatve tirohitakalaṅkarūpam akṣavalayameva mukhyatayāvagamyate tasyaiva ca karagrahaṇayogyatāyāṃ sārvatrikī prasiddhiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3286: śleṣacchāyayā tu kalaṅkasya karadhāraṇam asadeva pratyāsacyā,
GK16mamkpb_u:3287: upacarya yojyateśaśāṅkena kevalaṃ kalaṅkasya mūrtyaiva, udvahanāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3291: na cāsya karadhṛtatvaṃ tacvato 'stīti mukhye 'pyupacāra eva śaraṇaṃ syāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3293: yathā rājati taṭīyamabhihatadānavarāsātipātisārāvanadāḥ gajatā ca yūthamaviratadānavarā sātipāti sārā vanadā // 572 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3298: alaṃkārāṇāmekatra kamāveśe 'pi virodhāt na yatra yugapadavasthānam na caikatarasya
GK16mamkpb_u:3299: parigrahe sādhakam taditarasya vā parihāre bādhakamasti yainaikatara eva parigṛhyeta
GK16mamkpb_u:3300: sa niśvayābhāvarūpo dvitīyaḥ saṃkaraḥ samuccayena saṃkarasyaivākṣepāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3301: udāharaṇam-- jaha gahiro jaha raaṇaṇibbharo jaha a ṇimmalacchāo /
GK16mamkpb_u:3302: taha kiṃ vihiṇā eso sarasavāṇīo jalaṇihī ṇa kio // 573 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3303: atra samudre prastute viśeṣaṇasāmyādaprastutārthapratīteḥ kimasau samāsoktiḥ kim abdheraprastutasya mukhena kasyāpi tatsamaguṇatayā prastutasya
GK16mamkpb_u:3311: etaditi vaktraṃ nirdiśya tadrūpāropavaśāt rūpakam atha vā tayoḥ samuccayavivakṣāyāṃ dīpakam atha vā tulyayogitā kimupradeṣasamaye viśeṣaṇasāmyādānanasyāvagatau
GK16mamkpb_u:3317: nyāyaśva sādhakatvam anukūlatā doṣo 'pi bādhakatvaṃ pratikūlatā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3318: tatra saubhāgyaṃ vitanoti vaktraśaśino jyotsneva hāsadyutiḥ // 575 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3322: ityūpamāyāḥ sādhakam śaśinā tu na tathā pratikūleti rūpakaṃ prati tasyā abādhakatā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3324: ityātrāparatvamindoranuguṇaṃ na tu vaktrasya pratikūlamiti rūpakasya sādhakatāṃ pratipadyate na tūpamāyā bādhakatām /
GK16mamkpb_u:3326: ityatra punarāliṅganamupamāṃ nirasyati sadṛśaṃ prati parapreyasīprayuktasyāliṅganasyāsaṃbhavāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3327: pādāmbujaṃ bhavatu no vijayāya mañju- majjīraśijjitamanoharamambikāyāḥ // 578 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3328: ityatra mañjīraśiñjitam ambuje pratikūlam asaṃbhavāditi rūpakasya bādhakam na tu
GK16mamkpb_u:3329: pāde 'nukūlamityupamāyāḥ sādhakamamidhīyate vidhyupamardino bādhakasya tadapekṣayotkaṭatvena pratipatteḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3334: abhinne, eva pade sphuṭatayā yat ubhāvapi śabdārthālaṃkārau vyavasthāṃ samāsādayataḥ so 'pyaparaḥ saṃkaraḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3341: ekapadapratipādyatayā ca vyavasthitatvāttriprakatāra eva saṃkaro vyākṛtaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3342: prakārāntareṇa tu na śakyo vyākartum ānantyāttatprabhedānāmiti pratipāditāḥ śabdārthomayagatatvena traividhyajuṣo 'laṃkārāḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:3343: kutaḥ punareṣa niyamo yadeteṣāṃ tulye 'pi kāvyaśobhātiśayahetutve kaśvidalaṃkāraḥ śabdasya kaśvidarthasya kaśviccobhayasya,
GK16mamkpb_u:3344: iti cet uktamatra yathā kāvye doṣaguṇālaṃkārāṇāṃ śabdārthobhayagatatvena vyavakthāyāmanvayavyatirekāveva prabhavataḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3345: nimittāntarasyābhāvāt tataśva yo 'laṃkāro yadīyānvayavyatirekāvanuvidhatte sa tadalaṃkāro viyavasthāpyate, iti /
GK16mamkpb_u:3346: evaṃ ca yathā punaruktavadābhāsaḥ paraṃparitarūpakaṃ cobhayorbhāvābhāvānuvidhāyitayā,
GK16mamkpb_u:3348: arthasya tu tatra vaicitryam utkaṭatayā pratibhāsate,
GK16mamkpb_u:3350: yo 'laṃkāro yadāśritaḥ sa tadalaṃkāra ityapi kalpanāyām anvayavyatirekāveva samāśrayitavyau /
GK16mamkpb_u:3356: tathāhi--anuprāsasya prasiddhyabhāvo vaiphalyaṃ vṛttivirodha iti ye trayo doṣāḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3357: te prasiddhiviruddhatām apuṣṭārthatvam pratikūlavarṇatāṃ ca yathākramaṃ na vyatikrāmanti
GK16mamkpb_u:3358: tatsvabhāvatvāt krameṇodāharaṇam-- cakrī cakrārapaṅktiṃ harirapi ca haran dhūrjaṭirdhūrdhvajāgrā-
GK16mamkpb_u:3360: raṃhaḥ saṃghaḥ surāṇāṃ jagadupakṛtaye nityayuktasya yasya stauti prītiprasanno 'nvahamahimaruceḥ so 'vatātsyandano vaḥ // 580 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3362: anuprāsānurodhenaiva kṛtā na purāṇetihāsādiṣu tathā pratīteti prasiddhivirodhaḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:3364: yadi sallīlollāpini gacchasi tat kiṃ tvadīyaṃ me // 581 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3367: atra vācyasya vicintyamānaṃ na kiṃcidapi cārutvaṃ pratīyate,
GK16mamkpb_u:3373: yathā bhujaṅgamasyeva maṇiḥ sadambhā grāhāvakīrṇeva nadī sadambhāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3374: durantatāṃ nirṇayato 'pi jantoḥ karṣanti cetaḥ prasabhaṃ sadambhāḥ // 583 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3375: upamāyām upamānasya jātipramāṇagatanyūnatvam adhikatā vā tādṛśī,
GK16mamkpb_u:3377: dharṇāśraye tu nyūnādhikatve yathākramaṃ hīnapadatvamadhikapadatvaṃ ca na vyabhicarataḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:3378: krameṇodāharaṇam-- caṇḍālairiva yuṣmābhiḥ sāhasaṃ paramaṃ kṛtam // 584 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3387: atropamānasya mauñjīsthānīyastaḍillakṣaṇo dharmaḥ kenāpi padena na pratipādita iti hīnapadatvam //
GK16mamkpb_u:3388: sa pītavāsāḥ pragṛhītaśārṅgo manojñamīmaṃ vapurāpa kṛṣṇaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3393: upamānopameyayoḥ sādhāraṇaṃ cet dharmamanyarūpaṃ kuryāt tadā,
GK16mamkpb_u:3394: ekatarasyaiva taddharmasamanvayāvagateḥ saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasyopamānatvamupameyatvaṃ vā pratīyamānena dharmeṇa pratīyate,
GK16mamkpb_u:3396: yathā-- cintāratnamiva cayuto 'si karato dhiṅbhandabhāgyasya me // 590 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3398: yatra tu nānātve 'pi liṅgavacanayoḥ sāmānyābhidhāyi padaṃ svarupabhedaṃ nāpadyate na tatraitaddūṣaṇāvatāraḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3404: dadhate sma parāṃ śobhāṃ tadīyā vibhramā iva // 593 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3405: kālapuruṣavidhyādibhede 'pi na tathā pratītiraskhalitarūpatayā viśrāntimāsādayatītyasāvapi bhagnaprakramatayaiva vyāptaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3406: yathā atithiṃ nāma kākutsthāt putramāpa kumudvatī /
GK16mamkpb_u:3408: atra cetanā prasādamāpnoti na punarāpeti kālabhedaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3411: atra latā vibhrājate na tu vibhrājase,
GK16mamkpb_u:3415: ityādau ca gaṅgā pravahati na tu pravahatu, iti,
GK16mamkpb_u:3419: nanu samānam uccāritaṃ pratīyamānaṃ vā dharmāntaramupādāya paryavasitāyām upamāyām upameyasya prakṛtadhamābisaṃbandhānna kaśvitkālādibhedo 'sti
GK16mamkpb_u:3423: iti tatra yudhiṣṭhira iva satyavādyayaṃ satyaṃ vadatīti pratipatsyāmahe /
GK16mamkpb_u:3424: satyāvādī satyaṃ vadatīti ca na paunaruktayam āśaṅkanīyam raipoṣaṃ puṣṇātītivat yudhiṣṭhira iva satyavadanena satyavādyayamityarthāvagamāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3425: satyametat kiṃ tu sthiteṣu prayogeṣu samarthanamidaṃ na tu sarvathā niravadyam prastutavastupratītivyāghātāditi sacetasa evātra pramāṇam //
GK16mamkpb_u:3429: arthānāṃ ca raśmibhiḥ sādharmyaṃ kutrāpi na pratītamityanucitārthatvam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3432: atrāpi jvalantyo 'mbudhārāḥ sūryamaṇḍalāt niṣpatantyo na saṃbhavantītyupanibadhyamāno 'rtho 'naucityameva puṣṇāti //
GK16mamkpb_u:3433: utprekṣāyāmapi saṃbhāvanaṃ dhruvevādaya eva śabdā vaktuṃ sahante na yathāśabdo 'pi
GK16mamkpb_u:3434: kevalasyāsya sādharmyameva pratipādayituṃ paryāptatvāt tasya cāsyāmavivakṣitatvāditi
GK16mamkpb_u:3438: utprekṣitamapi tācvikena rupeṇa parivarjitatvāt nirupākhyaprakhyam tatsamarthanāya yat arthāntaranyāsopādānam tat ālokhyamiva gaganatale 'tyantamasamīcīnamiti
GK16mamkpb_u:3440: yathā divākarādrakṣati yo guhāsu līnaṃ divā bhītamivāndhakāram /
GK16mamkpb_u:3441: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne prapanne mamatvamuccaiḥ śirasāmatīva // 600 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3442: atrācetanasya tamaso divākarāttrāsa eva na saṃbhavatīti kuta eva tatprayojitamadriṇā paritrāṇam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3443: saṃbhāvitena tu rūteṇa pratibhāsamānasyāsya na kācidanupapattiravataratīti vyartha eva tatsamarthanāyāṃ yatnaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3445: upamānaviśeṣaṃ prakāśayatīti tasyātra punarupādāne prayojanābhāvāt anupādeyatvaṃ yat tat apuṣṭārthatvaṃ punaruktaṃ vā doṣaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3446: yathā spṛśati tigmarucau kakubhaḥ karairdayitayeva vijṛmbhitatāpayā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3448: atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhāṃ ca yathā sadṛśaviśeṣaṇavaśena vyaktiviśeṣaparigraheṇa ca nāyakatayā nāyikātvena ca vyaktiḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3449: tathā grīṣmadivasaśriyo 'pi pratīnāyikātvena bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ dayitayeti svaśabdopādānena //
GK16mamkpb_u:3451: yatropamānasyopādānamantareṇa sādhāraṇeṣvapi viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3455: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi upameyam anayaiva rītyā pratītaṃ na punaḥ prayogeṇa kadarthatāṃ neyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3456: yathā āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhyevāridhi vāvasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3457: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhik sāmānyamacetanaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatacvāntaram // 603 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3458: a6, acetanasya prabhoraprastutaviśiṣṭasāmānyadvāreṇābhivyaktau na yuktameva punaḥ kathanam //
GK16mamkpb_u:3463: ityeṣa mārgo viduṣāṃ vibhinno 'pyabhinnarūpaḥ pratimāsate yat /
GK16mamkpb_u:3464: na tadvicitraṃ yadamutra samyagvinirmitā saṃghaṭanaiva hetuḥ //1//
